  "description": "Urielsprout Limited - Our client, a reputable Hotel, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service / Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Benin, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a friendly and efficient Customer Service Representative to handle guest relations, inquiries, and front desk operations at our client hotel in Edo. This role ensures a smooth, professional, and welcoming experience for all guests.


Job Description
Content Creation &amp; Management:


	Develop original and visually appealing content for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and other platforms.
	Plan and schedule posts using social media management tools.
	Capture real-time photos/videos from hotel events, facilities, and guest experiences.


Community Engagement:


	Respond to comments, DMs, reviews, and inquiries in a timely and courteous manner.
	Monitor online reputation and flag potential PR concerns.
	Drive engagement through polls, contests, stories, and trend-based content.


Analytics &amp; Reporting:


	Track performance metrics (reach, engagement, impressions, clicks).
	Provide monthly reports on growth and recommend strategies to improve performance.
	Monitor competitor pages and industry trends.


Collaboration:


	Work with the marketing and customer service teams to align offline and online guest experience.
	Coordinate with photographers or designers when needed.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	OND/HND/BSc in Marketing, Mass Communication, Digital Media, or related field.
	Minimum of 1 year of relevant social media management experience (hospitality experience is a plus).
	Strong content writing, photography, and basic video editing skills.
	Familiarity with Canva, CapCut, or similar design tools.
	Knowledge of Meta Business Suite, Instagram Insights, and basic SEO is an advantage.
	Strong understanding of audience engagement and social media trends.
	Reliable, organized, and responsive to deadlines.


Key Skills &amp; Attributes:


	Creativity:&nbsp;Brings fresh, vibrant ideas to social media content.
	Digital Literacy:&nbsp;Navigates multiple platforms and tools comfortably.
	Visual Storytelling:&nbsp;Can turn ordinary hotel experiences into shareable moments.
	Engagement Focused:&nbsp;Understands audience behavior and adapts strategy accordingly.
	Brand Awareness:&nbsp;Maintains the voice and tone of the hotel consistently.


Salary
N80,000 - N120,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Resume and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;urielsproutrecruits@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Customer Service / Social Media Manager&quot; as the subject of the email.",

        Urielsprout Limited - Our client, a reputable Hotel, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service / Social Media Manager

Job Location: Benin, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a friendly and efficient Customer Service Representative to handle guest relations, inquiries, and front desk operations at our client hotel in Edo. This role ensures a smooth, professional, and welcoming experience for all guests.


Job Description
Content Creation & Management:
     

            
    




	Develop original and visually appealing content for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and other platforms.
	Plan and schedule posts using social media management tools.
	Capture real-time photos/videos from hotel events, facilities, and guest experiences.


Community Engagement:


	Respond to comments, DMs, reviews, and inquiries in a timely and courteous manner.
	Monitor online reputation and flag potential PR concerns.
	Drive engagement through polls, contests, stories, and trend-based content.


Analytics & Reporting:


	Track performance metrics (reach, engagement, impressions, clicks).
	Provide monthly reports on growth and recommend strategies to improve performance.
	Monitor competitor pages and industry trends.


Collaboration:


	Work with the marketing and customer service teams to align offline and online guest experience.
	Coordinate with photographers or designers when needed.


Qualifications & Requirements


	OND/HND/BSc in Marketing, Mass Communication, Digital Media, or related field.
	Minimum of 1 year of relevant social media management experience (hospitality experience is a plus).
	Strong content writing, photography, and basic video editing skills.
	Familiarity with Canva, CapCut, or similar design tools.
	Knowledge of Meta Business Suite, Instagram Insights, and basic SEO is an advantage.
	Strong understanding of audience engagement and social media trends.
	Reliable, organized, and responsive to deadlines.

	Creativity: Brings fresh, vibrant ideas to social media content.

Business Development Manager Job at A&R Group




        
    

        
        A&R Group is a leading conglomerate with diversified interests in real estate development, hospitality, construction, and mining. With a strong presence in Lagos and expanding operations across Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a dynamic Business Development Manager to drive growth, forge strategic partnerships, and enhance our market position.
	The Business Development Manager will be responsible for the growth and management of the company, identifying new business opportunities, building client relationships, and driving revenue growth across our group’s sectors.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in sales, market expansion, and strategic planning within real estate (most especially), hospitality, construction, or mining.


Responsibilities


	Developing a Strategy for the existing business growth and development and management of company(ies)
	Identify and pursue new business opportunities in real estate, hospitality, construction, and mining sectors.
	Develop and implement growth strategies to expand market share.
	Collaborate with internal teams (marketing, operations, finance) to align business objectives.
	Prepare and present business proposals, feasibility reports, and financial projections.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, investors, and stakeholders.
	Conduct market research to identify trends, competitor activities, and potential areas for expansion.
	Lead negotiations for partnerships, joint ventures, and high-value deals.
	Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and networking forums.
	Monitor industry regulations and ensure compliance in all business dealings.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Real Estate, or a related field. An MBA is a plus.
	5+ years of proven experience in business development, sales, or strategic partnerships within real estate, hospitality, construction, or mining.
	Strong network of industry contacts in Lagos/Nigeria.
	Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation skills.
	Proficiency in market analysis and financial modelling.
	Ability to work independently and lead cross-functional teams.


Preferred Skills: 


	Experience working in a diversified group of companies.
	Knowledge of the Lagos real estate market, hospitality trends, or mining regulations.
	Familiarity with government tenders and public-private partnerships (PPP)*.


Benefits


	Salary: N400,000 - N500,000 Monthly.
	Competitive salary + performance-based bonuses.
	Opportunity to work with a fast-growing conglomerate.
	Career growth and professional development.
	Health insurance and other benefits.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: argroupnigeria@gmail.com using “Business Development Manager Application - [Your Name]" as the subject of the email.
